sentences.en: A fence runs around our classroom.
sentences.cn: 我们的教室周围有一圈篱笆。

sentences.en: A quiet murmur passed through the classroom.
sentences.cn: 一阵悄悄的低语声传遍了整个教室。

sentences.en: Don't forget to turn out the light when you leave the classroom.
sentences.cn: 你离开教室时别忘了关灯.

sentences.en: School trips give children firsthand experience not available in the classroom.

sentences.en: She fainted in the classroom and was carried out.
sentences.cn: 她在教室中昏过去了，并被抬了出来。

sentences.en: Teachers need to prepare their students to deal with real-world situations outside the classroom.
sentences.cn: 教师应该让学生作好应对课堂以外的现实世界的准备。

sentences.en: The boy bounced out of the classroom.
sentences.cn: 那男孩突然从教室里奔出去。

sentences.en: The children cooperated with their teachers in keeping the classroom neat.
sentences.cn: 孩子们和老师一起保持教室整洁.

sentences.en: The classroom teacher must be sensitive to a child'sneeds.
sentences.cn: 班主任必须对小学生的需求体察入微。

sentences.en: The people that she had in her classroom were beginning learners.
sentences.cn: 她带的这班学生都是初学者。
